text: Christophe Priou (born 2 May 1958 in Nantes) is a French politician of The Republicans who served as a member of the National Assembly of France from 2002 until 2017, representing the Loire-Atlantique department. In the Republicans’ 2016 presidential primaries, Priou endorsed François Fillon as the party's candidate for the office of President of France.Ludovic Vigogne (April 20, 2016), Bataillons: Primaire à droite: la liste des premiers soutiens parlementaires L'Opinion. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:People from Nantes Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Gaullism, a way forward for France Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Senators of Loire- Atlantique
title: Christophe Priou
